overview: Pescadores de Palavras" directs the focus to names that go back to marginal literature, from the "Mimeographer Generation" in the 1970s and 1980s, and to the resilience of current literature. how Grupo Picaré revolutionized the region's literature, how Revista Mirante remains the country's oldest independent literature magazine, and how the artisanal publisher Costas Felinas persists in its activist ideal of remaining faithful to the non-commercial and non-commercial ideal. mercantilist.
title: Pescadores de Palavras
